message.body: Heya Mark
Yo. What were u doing up @3 dark¾?
Getting ready for bed
We missed you at Conterpoint
Is everything ok?
Pretty much. - I wish I could have been there too. Too much to do here, and cutting costs...
bc my income's gonna take a big cut when I retire in Nov. also I have been making a lot of house repairs.
but I need to be getting out more to see real friends in real life. and it occurs to me that cons are a good way to do that!
Bastille day, Sunday July 14, I'll be having really is unveiling in Framingham
Rene's! (speech recognition on Android, pooh)
I admit I haven't trained it, but this Swype keyboarding is pretty good. Close digression :-)
Going to Dr.'s Ofc now. Can continue from trolley & waiting room.
Waiting for Dr.now. - Walking to the trolley I realized I wasn't going to get here on time so I turned back & drove. It's 15 for all-day parking but I'
m really tired of being late. & of course bring late for a med appt means someone else gets called first, and then it all gets later
Ok
We were all worried about you
Hope you make it to Contata - got an evil plan to involve you with
Although you kind of are already
Yep - been through that
"kind of are already" - involved? BWAH-hah-hah!!!!!!!
I'm planning on being at Contata.
Yeah - I saw your name on the lead sheet Warren Mars sent me
Seen the Facebook thread asking for G&S filks?
We are planning to drop that on Glasser at a night filk - flashmob style with Liam Brown's hedgehog
No I haven't - what did you do there?
I don't know that one but would love to learn it and help drop the bomb
Supposedly you helped write it or arrange it
(I have my own hedgehog instantiation but that's not in question here)
It being "The Hedgehog Can Never Be Buggered at All"
Well sure when you said hedgehog but what's the first line or chorus or something to ID it?
My evil plan, approved and embellished by - in order - Josh, Batya & Merav
IS it mine? "Old Noah was mucking the Ark out one day…"
Noah had a great ark
For three of the parts & old Noah was mucking for the fourth
Doma unconstitutional!
Finally!
5-4 Scalia & someone else dissenting
(after the lecture - useful info actually - about Shelter In Place, I am back in the examining room, still waiting for the dr)
Oh what I was going to say: while we were heading down the stairs & waiting outside I heard several conversations that must've been about DOMA .... R.I.P.!
